listMovie.movieDescription: A boy raised by boars, who wears a boar's head, boards the Infinity Train on a new mission with the Flame Pillar along with another boy who reveals his true power when he sleeps. Their mission is to defeat a demon who has been tormenting people and killing the demon slayers who oppose it.
listMovie.movieCast: Natsuki Hanae (voice), Akari Kit√¥ (voice), Hiro Shimono(voice)
